SEARCH
Package control

Class CompanyRepresentativeController

java.lang.Object
control.BaseController
control.CompanyRepresentativeController
public class CompanyRepresentativeController extends BaseController
Controller for company representative operations.

Handles creating/editing/deleting internships, toggling visibility, and retrieving applications/notifications for a company.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CompanyRepresentativeController()
    Construct the controller and preload internships and applications from CSV.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompanyRepresentativeController

      public CompanyRepresentativeController()
      Construct the controller and preload internships and applications from CSV.

  • Method Details

    • canCreateMoreInternships

      public boolean canCreateMoreInternships(String companyName)
      Check whether the company may create more internships (enforces a maximum per company).
      Parameters:
      companyName - the company name to check
      Returns:
      true if the company can create another internship

    • viewMyInternships

      public List<Internship> viewMyInternships(String companyName, List<String> statusFilters, List<String> levelFilters, List<String> majorFilters)
      Return the company's internships, optionally filtered by status/level/major.
      Parameters:
      companyName - company name to filter by
      statusFilters - status filters to apply (nullable)
      levelFilters - level filters to apply (nullable)
      majorFilters - preferred major filters to apply (nullable)
      Returns:
      list of internships matching the criteria

    • createInternship

      public boolean createInternship(String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, String openingDate, String closingDate, String companyName, String representativeId, int numberOfSlots)
      Create a new internship and persist it (defaults to Pending / not visible).
      Parameters:
      title - internship title
      description - description text
      level - level string (e.g., "Basic", "Advanced")
      preferredMajor - preferred major
      openingDate - opening date as yyyy-MM-dd
      closingDate - closing date as yyyy-MM-dd
      companyName - company name
      representativeId - representative id string (stored in "Representatives" field)
      numberOfSlots - number of available slots
      Returns:
      true when creation and CSV write succeed

    • editInternship

      public boolean editInternship(String internshipUUID, String newTitle, String newDescription, String newLevel, String newPreferredMajor, String newOpeningDate, String newClosingDate, int newNumberOfSlots)
      Edit an existing internship (only allowed when internship is pending).
      Parameters:
      internshipUUID - internship UUID string
      newTitle - new title (nullable/empty to keep)
      newDescription - new description
      newLevel - new level
      newPreferredMajor - new preferred major
      newOpeningDate - new opening date (yyyy-MM-dd)
      newClosingDate - new closing date (yyyy-MM-dd)
      newNumberOfSlots - new slot count (1-10)
      Returns:
      true when update and persistence succeed

    • deleteInternship

      public boolean deleteInternship(String internshipUUID)
      Delete a pending internship and persist changes.
      Parameters:
      internshipUUID - internship UUID string to delete
      Returns:
      true on successful deletion and persistence

    • toggleInternshipVisibility

      public boolean toggleInternshipVisibility(String internshipUUID, int option)
      Toggle visibility of an approved internship.
      Parameters:
      internshipUUID - internship UUID string
      option - 1 = visible, 2 = not visible
      Returns:
      true on success

    • getInternshipsWithApplications

      public Map<String,List<Application>> getInternshipsWithApplications(String companyName)
      Retrieve internships for a company along with their applications.
      Parameters:
      companyName - company to retrieve apps for
      Returns:
      map of internship UUID -> list of Application (may be empty)

    • updateApplicationStatus

      public boolean updateApplicationStatus(String internshipUUID, String studentUserId, String newStatus)
      Update the status of a student's application for a given internship and persist changes.
      Parameters:
      internshipUUID - internship UUID string
      studentUserId - student user id
      newStatus - new status string (e.g., "Successful", "Unsuccessful")
      Returns:
      true when update and CSV rewrite succeed

    • checkNotifications

      public List<String> checkNotifications(CompanyRepresentative companyRep)
      Produce short notifications for the company representative (e.g., rejected internships). Rejected internships are removed from the in-memory map and persisted.
      Parameters:
      companyRep - the CompanyRepresentative to check notifications for
      Returns:
      list of notification messages (may be empty)
